citation: Proclamation under the Nature Conservation Act 2002 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Nature Conservation Act 2002

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 11(2) of the Nature Conservation Act 2002 declare â€“

        (a) the Crown land specified in Part 1 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of regional reserve and give the name Four Mile Beach Regional Reserve to that reserved land; and
        (b) the Crown land specified in Part 2 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of regional reserve and give the name Lukes Knob Regional Reserve to that reserved land; and
        (c) the Crown land specified in Part 3 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of regional reserve and give the name Cameron Regional Reserve to that reserved land; and
        (d) the Crown land specified in Part 4 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of regional reserve and give the name Cameron Regional Reserve to that reserved land; and
        (e) that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
20 April 2011

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRIAN WIGHTMAN

Minister for Environment, Parks and Heritage

SCHEDULE 1 - Areas of land

PART 1 - Four Mile Beach Regional Reserve

All that area of land comprising about 3 311 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by heavy black lines on Plan 7304 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 1 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 2 - Lukes Knob Regional Reserve

All that area of land comprising about 3 078 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 7398 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 2 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 3 - Cameron Regional Reserve (First extension)

All that area of land comprising about 1.376 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 7597 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 3 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 4 - Cameron Regional Reserve (Second extension)

All that area of land comprising about 25.75 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 7617 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 4 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

SCHEDULE 2 - Plans

PART 1 - Four Mile Beach Regional Reserve

PART 2 - Lukes Knob Regional Reserve

PART 3 - Cameron Regional Reserve (First extension)

PART 4 - Cameron Regional Reserve (Second extension)

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 April 2011

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
